headline: J.B. Hunt’s Veteran-Friendly Culture Earns National Recognitions From VIQTORY, Newsweek and Military Times
summary: LOWELL, Ark., November 11, 2024--J.B. Hunt Transport Services Inc. (NASDAQ: JBHT), one of the largest supply chain solutions providers in North America, announced today that it has been honored with national recognitions from VIQTORY as a Top 10 Military Friendly® Employer, Newsweek as one of America’s Greatest Workplaces for Veterans, and Military Times as Best for Vets.

headline: JB Hunt installs inward-facing cameras in all of its trucks
summary: The Lowell, Arkansas-based carrier previously piloted the technology and noted meaningful cost savings.
